title: `exclusiveMinimum` must be strictly less than `exclusiveMaximum`
description: In draft-06 and newer the exclusive keywords take numeric values. They must satisfy `exclusiveMinimum < exclusiveMaximum`.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: exclusiveMinimum >= exclusiveMaximum
comprehensiveExamples.description: Exclusive bounds must satisfy exclusiveMinimum < exclusiveMaximum.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Strictly ordered exclusive bounds
comprehensiveExamples.description: Exclusive bounds that are strictly ordered are valid.

message: Ensure exclusiveMinimum is lower than exclusiveMaximum.
